post.author: 이준희
post.content:
We are looking for 2 of intermediate .Net developer for 3 month contract
in this our cardoneplus and okcash projects.The techical and soft requirements are :

1.+2 years experience dev. with .Net and c#
2.+3 years classic ASP,XML and MS-SQL
3.Hand on experience in WebService method and proxy clients
4.Excellent understanding in konwledge of Financial and Credit Card System
5.Good understanding in analysis and implementation of Webservice transaction and security

Send to resume :john821@gamil.com (dev manager,B-Dist Inc )
(company)416-733-2924,(cell)416-737-2277
http://www.okcash.net/
post.title: Intermediate developer&programmer
